template.name: SNMP MegaRAID SAS
template.description: ## Description Zabbix Template for Avago Megaraid SAS (formerly LSI) RAID cards ## Overview This is initial template for Monitoring LSI/Avago/Broadcom (or branded like Intel, IBM, Supermicro etc) MegaRAID based hardware RAID cards. According to vendor docs it should also support non-RAID adapters, enclosures and some other devices. It took me one night to complete major/required parts, so far template supports most of the options and all the critical components to keep you warned in case some RAID-related problems will occur. Supported so far: * Full LLD Support * Informational part for agent/driver/module * Complete Adapter-Related OID list with graphs and triggers * Part of Device-Related OID's with graphs * All triggers that are crucial * Comments for all OID's with value mappings from MegaRAID MIB Planned: * Value Mappings * Completing list of device OID's and related graphs * virtualDevice OID's and related graphs * enclosureInfo OID's and related graphs * Trap setting OID's * Traps for trapper * Check for updated version Not tested yet: * M$ Windows Support * Values and units are done as per MIB doc with 1-1 match, cannot guarantee that they are correct if vendor has provided wrong info (apparently, there is at least one minor issue) Installation and Requirements: * Ensure, that LSI-MegaRAID-SAS-MIB files downloaded from vendor site are installed and added to snmp.conf (after that you can restart both agent and server) * Ensure, that appropriate package (snmp sas or snmp sas\_ir) with MegaRAID snmp agent wrapper is installed and running, snmpd.conf for OID's are set as per doc for wrapper * Ensure, that Zabbix is allowed to gather information from snmpd * Ensure, that required device drivers are installed on the hosts * Import Template, assign to hosts * Wait for LLD to check all OID's and start gathering data * Have a good night's sleep Bugs? -> Please Report @GitHub or at giomac gmail com When will you finish this? -> Nah, all critical issues are included, will do, definitely, but not asap ## Author George Machitidze

item.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Number of SAS adapters present

trigger.name: No MegaRAID adapters present on host

item.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Agent Module Name
MegaRAID SAS MIB Agent Module Version

trigger.name: No SNMP data available for MegaRAID devices for 5 min

discovery_rule.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB SAS adapters
discovery_rule.description: A List of adapter Entries containing Information/Properties about the MegaRAID related adapters on host.

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Abort CC on detecting error support for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Abort CC on detecting error is supported on this adapter. Values:No(0),Yes(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Abort Consistency Check on error Adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Abort CC on detecting error is enabled or disabled on this adapter. Values:No(0),Yes(1),NA(2)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Adapter $1 PCI Vendor ID
item_prototype.description: PCI Vendor ID for this Adapter.

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Alarm Control Support for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Alarm control support for this adapter. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Alarm State on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Alarm is enabled or disabled on this adapter. Values:disabled(0),enabled(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Controller encryption support on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: if it is set (1) supports controller encryption

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Mixer Redundancy Support for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Allow different Virtual Disk on the same array to have different redundancy levels. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Mix in Enclosure Support on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Mix InEnclosure support. Values:notSupported(0), supported(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Mix in Virtual Drive Support on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: MixInVIRTUALDRIVE support. Values:notSupported(0), supported(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Allow SSD/HDD Mix within LD on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: allow SSD/HDD mix within an LD.allow(1), not allow(0)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB SATA in Cluster Support on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: SataInCluster support. Values:notSupported(0), supported(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Allow SAS/SATA SSD within LD on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: allow SAS/SATA SSD mix within an LD. allow(1), not allow(0)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Battery Backup Unit Support for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: BBU support for this adapter. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.description: Background initialization rate change support for this adapter. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Background Initialization Rate on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Background initialization rate for this adapter.

item_prototype.description: bios Not Detected support for this Adapter. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.description: Cache flush interval in seconds for this adapter.

item_prototype.description: 1=controller cache is pinned for missing or offline LDs

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Consistensy Check Rate Change Support for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Consistency Check rate change support for this Adapter. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Consistency Check Rate on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Consistency Check rate on this Adapter.

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Cluster State on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Cluster is enabled or disabled on this adapter. Values:disabled(0),enabled(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Cluster Support for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Cluster support for this adapter. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.description: Drive capacity coercion mode. 0->None;1->128MB;2->1GB

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Compatibility for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: To inform compatibilities between Applications and FW. 0->incompatible;1->compatible

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Compatibility info for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Compatibility Information. Format->(Firmware Forward compatibility flag:Firmware Backward compatibility flag:Firmware version flag:Application Forward compatibility flag:Application Backward compatibility flag:Application version flag)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB CopyBack state on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: CopyBack is enabled or disabled on this adapter.Values:disabled(0),enabled(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Controller SAS Addresses on adapter $1
item_prototype.description: This field gives the controller SAS address

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Dedicated Hotspares Support for adapter $1
item_prototype.description: Dedicated HotSpares support for this adapter. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB adapter $1 default power saving policy
item_prototype.description: power saving policy.values:controller default power saving policy=0, AUTO=1, MAX=2, Max with no cache=6, NONE=255

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Adapter $1 PCI Device ID
item_prototype.description: PCI Device ID for this Adapter.

item_prototype.description: Device Port address comma delimited

item_prototype.description: Device Port Count on this adapter.

item_prototype.description: Multiple device interface support values separated by space.

item_prototype.description: 0=Large IO is supported, 1=Large IO is unsupported

item_prototype.description: LD power savings are disabled for yy hours beginning at disableLdPSTime.

item_prototype.description: LD power savings shall be disabled at xx minutes from 12:00am.

item_prototype.description: Spin Down Hotspares(0), Do Not Spin Down Hotspares(1)

item_prototype.description: This field gives the Domain ID

discovery_rule.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB SAS devices
discovery_rule.description: A List of device Entries containing Information/Properties about the MegaRAID related devices on host.

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Device $1 Adapter Port(s) to which it is connected
item_prototype.description: Adapter port(s) to which the device is connected.

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Maximum Supported Speed for Device $1
item_prototype.description: Maximum supported speed. Values:speed-unknown(0),speed-1p5G(1),speed-3G(2),speed-6G(3)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Device $1 Ready for Removal
item_prototype.description: If true, drive is ready for removal. Values:false(0),true(1)

item_prototype.description: Negotiated link speed. Values:speed-unknown(0),speed-1p5G(1),speed-3G(2),speed-6G(3)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Media Error Count of Device $1
item_prototype.description: Error count of the device

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Device $1 Certtified by OEM
item_prototype.description: Is the drive certified by the OEM (OEM-specific checks). Values:notCertified(1), Certified(0)

trigger_prototype.name: MegaRAID Device {#SNMPVALUE} not certified by OEM

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Device $1 Supported by OEM
item_prototype.description: Is the drive supported by the OEM (OEM-specific checks). Values:notSupported(1), supported(0)

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Operation progress for Device $1
item_prototype.description: Operation progress in %. e.g. Rebuild progress is 10%

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Other Error Count of Device $1
item_prototype.description: Error count of the device

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Firmware Interpretation of state of Device $1
item_prototype.description: Firmware's interpretation of drive state. Values:unconfigured-good(0),unconfigured-bad(1),hot-spare(2),offline(16),failed(17),rebuild(20),online(24),copyback(32),system(64),UNCONFIGURED-SHIELDED(128),HOTSPARE-SHIELDED(130),CONFIGURED-SHIELDED(144)

trigger_prototype.name: Unconfigured Bad state for MegaRAID Drive {#SNMPVALUE}

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Device $1 Temperature
item_prototype.description: Physical Drive temperature in Celsius

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Predictive Fail Count of Device $1
item_prototype.description: Predictive fail count of the device

item_prototype.name: MegaRAID SAS MIB Type of Device $1
item_prototype.description: Type of this Device. Values:disk(0),tape(1),printer(2),processor(3),cdrom(5),scanner(6),optical(7),enclosure(13),dvd(10),unknown(31)
